title: Mecklenburg County Welcomes Global Trade and Business Conference
content: Mecklenburg County will take a turn on the international stage beginning April 30 when it welcomes the British American Business Network (BABN) Transatlantic Conference s. Speakers, panelists, and other special guests will also take part. Sessions will spotlight the investment relationships among the nations and rest of the world, deregulation, sustainability, sports as an economic driver, and more.The BABN Transatlantic Conference includes high-level business discussions among senior executives and decision-makers, thought-leaders and government representatives from the U.K. and U.S. actively involved in bilateral trade, investment and business flows among the nation Mecklenburg County also recently celebrated the 30th anniversary of a partnership with the State of Mecklenburg-Vorpommern, Germany, intended to strengthen the business, cultural, and educational bonds between the two regions and nations.
